roles.name: Chief Executive Officer
roles.description: Sets company vision and strategy, oversees all functions, responsible for fundraising and key partnerships.

roles.name: Head of Engineering
roles.description: Owns engineering roadmap, architecture decisions, and delivery quality for all products.

roles.name: Founding Engineer
roles.description: Early engineer owning large parts of the stack, from infrastructure to UI, and establishing engineering practices.

roles.name: Senior Software Engineer
roles.description: Designs, implements, and maintains core services and features, mentors junior engineers.

roles.name: Machine Learning Engineer
roles.description: Builds and deploys ML/AI models into production, owns data pipelines and evaluation.

roles.name: Product Manager
roles.description: Owns problem discovery, prioritization, and product roadmap; works with engineering and design.

roles.name: UX/Product Designer
roles.description: Designs user experiences, workflows, and visuals across web and mobile surfaces.

roles.name: People Operations Specialist
roles.description: Manages hiring, onboarding, performance cycles, and employee engagement.
